metadata.metaValue:
import time
import maya.cmds as mc

scenename = mc.file(q=True, sn=True)[:-3]
if scenename:
    scenename += ".bob"
    mc.vnnNode(BifrostEditorPlus.currentGraph(), BifrostEditorPlus.currentNode(), spv=["filename", scenename])
    mc.vnnNode(BifrostEditorPlus.currentGraph(), BifrostEditorPlus.currentNode(), spv=["key", int(time.time())])

import maya.cmds as mc
mc.vnnNode(BifrostEditorPlus.currentGraph(), BifrostEditorPlus.currentNode(), spv=["save", 1])
mc.evalDeferred('mc.evalDeferred(\'mc.vnnNode(BifrostEditorPlus.currentGraph(), BifrostEditorPlus.currentNode(), spv=["save", 0])\')')

import maya.cmds as mc
mc.vnnNode(BifrostEditorPlus.currentGraph(), BifrostEditorPlus.currentNode(), spv=["reload", 1])
mc.evalDeferred('mc.evalDeferred(\'mc.vnnNode(BifrostEditorPlus.currentGraph(), BifrostEditorPlus.currentNode(), spv=["reload", 0])\')')

import maya.cmds as mc
mc.vnnNode(BifrostEditorPlus.currentGraph(), BifrostEditorPlus.currentNode(), spv=["clear", 1])
mc.evalDeferred('mc.evalDeferred(\'mc.vnnNode(BifrostEditorPlus.currentGraph(), BifrostEditorPlus.currentNode(), spv=["clear", 0])\')')
